fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Customs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: EOCC is following legislative files which are relevant for the organic (control and certification sector). It pays particular attention to the revisions of the regulation on official controls ans of the regulation on organic production and organic labelling.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar

goals__remit:
EOCC Mission: Cooperating for reliability 
Overall Goal of EOCC: Ensure and enhance the reliability of control and certification activities and decisions linked to EU regulations related to organic production.  
 
EOCC´s key objectives:  
- harmonize the implementation and interpretation of current EU legislation on organic production methods.  
- pro-actively collaborates with responsible authorities and equivalent partners of the organic sector to support the continuous development of European organic legislation which allows more efficient and consistent controls and certifications.
